ygData.subject: Re: Using Trade window against KSers.
ygData.msgSnippet: How can that be bannable if they can just turn off their trade window...believe me.. i will be trying this to the next ks that takes my trainer....bwahahah....
ygData.messageBody:
How can that be bannable if they can just turn off their trade
window...believe me.. i will be trying this to the next ks that takes my
trainer....bwahahah....




>From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Using Trade window against KSers.
>Date: Tue, 3 Aug 1999 14:19:15 -0400 (EDT)
>
>From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
>Believe it or not, but, repeatedly opening a trade window on someone to
>interrupt their play is a bannable offense. Kill
>Stealing, in and of itself is *NOT* bannable.
>
>If you find a KSer that doesnt have his trade options turned off, and you
>do this sort of thing, YOU will be the one banned, not the kser.
>
>
>Mr. J Daniels
>
>
>
>
